stories.title: Is Something Wrong with the Internet?

stories.text: I'm just the founder. gitlab.com/pulsechaincom | PulseChain.com. Saves the environment using proof of stake instead of proof of work. Has higher throughput, faster blocks, which is common in ETH forks. What it has that's more interesting is the entire ETH system state,  25% fee burning, no inflation. Most crypto things on here are met with hatred, but this one raised (and is still raising) millions and millions to try and save lives, so maybe it will get just a lukewarm response :) I'm pretty sleep deprived. Heading to sleep for a bit.
